entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 8:47 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 6

entry.title: Wednesday night: Fog. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries in the morning. Fog dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
